name: vue-webpack
description: This is Vue Application maintain the light weight configuration using Webpack

scripts.build: npm run clean; webpack build --config configs/webpack/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean; webpack build --env variant=dev --config configs/webpack/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:uat: npm run clean; webpack build --env variant=uat --config configs/webpack/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean; webpack build --env variant=prod --config configs/webpack/webpack.config.js
